_header: Saint Mark has in his matters meant
_description: Gospel for the Twelfth Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint mark has in his maters mentAnd sais whils crist in þis werld went…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …We may be seker of heuyn medeOure lord ihesu vs þeder lede
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “EXiens ihesu crist de finibus tiry.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica xii estatis secundum Marcum (rubric, f. 110va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.64-69.
